thread.title: Chairman Wants Team to ‘Open Aperture’ Against ISIL (US Department of Defense)
thread.title_full: Chairman Wants Team to ‘Open Aperture’ Against ISIL (US Department of Defense) - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Chairman Wants Team to ‘Open Aperture’ Against ISIL (US Department of Defense)
text: ( Source : US Department of Defense ) ABOARD A MILITARY AIRCRAFT, October 20 , 2015 - The chairman of the Joint Chiefs of Staff wants his team 'to open the aperture' as they look to combat the Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant. Marine Corps
